content.rendered:
Directed by Abhinay Deo.

Written by Parveez Sheikh.

Cast John Abraham(Yashwardhan). Abhinay Raj Singh(Suneel). Sonakshi Sinha(KK). Tahir Raj Bhasin(Shiv). Adil Hussain(Brijesh Yadav (HRD Minister)). Nasir Khan(Asad Raw Agent). BjÃ¶rn Freiberg(Sniper) . Mohammad Farman Ali(CBI Investigator).Paras Arora. Raj Babbar(Zonal Director). Vikas Bangar(Raw Agent). Tsogbaatar Batzorig(Chinese Agent). Mohnish Behl(In Phoyograph). Debanjan Chatterjee(RAW Officer Dubey). Genelia D’Souza(Maya).Freddy Daruwala. Anoop Gautam(Interogation officer). Abudhar Al Hassan(Indian Embassy Official). J. Brandon Hill(Tattoo Maker). Boman Irani(Karan Pratap Singh). Narendra Jha(Anjan). Luis Mc(Swat Agent). Yusof Mutahar(Cameo). Abhimanyu Sarkar(RAW Agent). Aashin A. Shah(Indian Embassy Official). Manish Soni(Shiv’s Frind). Surender Thakur(Goon). Muskaan Tomar(Villan’s sister). Ã“csai KrisztiÃ¡n(Security Guard (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers John Abraham. GyÃ¶rgy Czutor. Sheel Kumar. Ravichand Nallappa. Jaswinder Pabbla. Aashin A. Shah. Vipul Amrutlal Shah. Adi Sharmaa. Archana Tamboskar. Saahadat Showkat Wani.

Production Sunshine Pictures. Viacom18 Motion Pictures.
